Hey, I'm Zinzy Waleson, a person online and in Amsterdam. This here is a quiet street of the Internet where I come to link and think. I'm a researcher and designer making tools for people at work. Learn more about me, this website or what I'm up to now, say hello, or visit the archive.

Is the Pope gay?

In January of 2021 I created a one-pager called â€œIs the Pope gay?â€. As is the case with so many of my other ideas, I came up with this website because something happened on the Internet: the .gay domain extension had just become available. Next to isthepope.gay, I registered a wide variety of domains. My favorite was everyoneatthevaticanis.gay, which led to my own website.

After a year of cheap fun Iâ€™ve let go of all of my .gay domains, but this project remains on Netlify.

This website is part of the IndieWeb. If you'd like to learn what that means to me, as well as find out more about the structural setup of this website, please visit the colophon.
